aboutMe.name: Aafreen Munaf Khan
aboutMe.bio: Passionate Frontend Developer with experience in AI-driven applications, cloud deployment, and UI/UX design. Strong foundation in ReactJS, Node.js, and AWS.

academicBackground.degree: Bachelor of Engineering - Computer Science (AI & ML)

workExperience.description: Gained hands-on experience with AWS (S3, EC2, Lambda) for cloud deployment. Developed AI-driven applications with optimized infrastructure for large-scale data.
Built AI-powered diet & workout recommendation system using React, Node.js, and TensorFlow. Integrated Edamam API for real-time meal planning & YouTube Data API for workouts.
